Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
![](http://f.hq88.com/uploadfiles/HQ88_CMS/newsEditor/2015/12/24/png/2015122410373212.png)
Welcome to [Hexo](http://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](http://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](http://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](http://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](http://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

title: Hello World
date: 2016-01-28 21:18:28
---

Welcome to [Hexo](http://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](http://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](http://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](http://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](http://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: HomeBrew -- OSX
Post._content:
![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/HomeBrewPoster.jpg)

## 1. 


## 2. 
* *nix(Unix-like: Linux, Mac OS X, FreeBSD)
* Windows(Installer)"Next"->"Next"->...->"Finish"<!--AxBxxC~~~-->
* *nixMac OS X(OSX)LinuxFreeBSDLinuxFreeBSDDebian: apt-get, Redhat/CentOS/Fedora: yum, ArchLinux: pacman
* MacBookITITOSXGUI*nixngnixapacheOSX

## 3. OSX 
* __MacPorts__BSDportsMacbook09mc207P7550CPUMacPortsMacPortsYosemiteEl Capitan
* __Fink__: `FinkDebianpackaging tools(pre-compiled/pre-built) 
Finkpackagebinary code FinkpackageFink` 
* __HomeBrew__: HomeBrewRubyMacportsFink 

## 4. HomeBrew 
* HomeBrewRubyOSXRuby(Terminal)`/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"`That's all

## 5. HomeBrew
* wgetOSXwget
* `brew search wget`  
* `brew install wget` /usr/local
* `brew info wget` 
* `brew uninstall wget`  
* `brew update` HomeBrewgitgithubpull
* `brew upgrade`  
* `brew cleanup` 
* `brew list` HomeBrew 
* `brew doctor`  HomeBrew

## 6. HomeBrew
* `wget` 
* `htop` topCPUuptime
* `tree` 
* `tmux` 
* `hardlink-osx` 
* `macvim` vimOSXGUIOSXcmd+w
* `mpg123` `mpg321` 
* `mplayer` `mpv` 
* `mtr` traceroute
* `nvm` node
* `python3` OSXPython3

## 7. Cask -- HomeBrew
* OSXChrome, FirefoxMysqlWorkbench
* Cask`brew tap phinze/homebrew-cask && brew install brew-cask`
* Chrome 
	* `brew cask search chrome` google-chrome
	* `brew cask install google-chrome` 
	* `brew cask uninstall google-chrome` 
	* `brew update` 
	* `brew cleanup`  
* CaskbrewupgradeshellCask `for c in $(brew cask list); do ! brew cask info $c | grep -qF "Not installed" || brew cask install $c; done`

## 8. 
HomeBrewHomeBrewCaskupgradeshell~
![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/donate-me.png)

  • MacBookITITOSXGUI*nixngnixapacheOSX

3. OSX

  • MacPortsBSDportsMacbook09mc207P7550CPUMacPortsMacPortsYosemiteEl Capitan
  • Fink: FinkDebianpackaging tools(pre-compiled/pre-built) Finkpackagebinary code FinkpackageFink
  • HomeBrew: HomeBrewRubyMacportsFink

4. HomeBrew

  • HomeBrewRubyOSXRuby(Terminal)/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"Thats all

5. HomeBrew

  • wgetOSXwget
  • brew search wget
  • brew install wget /usr/local
  • brew info wget
  • brew uninstall wget
  • brew update HomeBrewgitgithubpull
  • brew upgrade
  • brew cleanup
  • brew list HomeBrew
  • brew doctor HomeBrew

6. HomeBrew

  • wget
  • htop topCPUuptime
  • tree
  • tmux
  • hardlink-osx
  • macvim vimOSXGUIOSXcmd+w
  • mpg123 mpg321
  • mplayer mpv
  • mtr traceroute
  • nvm node
  • python3 OSXPython3

7. Cask HomeBrew

  • OSXChrome, FirefoxMysqlWorkbench
  • Caskbrew tap phinze/homebrew-cask && brew install brew-cask
  • Chrome
    • brew cask search chrome google-chrome
    • brew cask install google-chrome
    • brew cask uninstall google-chrome
    • brew update
    • brew cleanup
  • CaskbrewupgradeshellCask for c in $(brew cask list); do ! brew cask info $c | grep -qF "Not installed" || brew cask install $c; done

8.

HomeBrewHomeBrewCaskupgradeshell~

Post.title: Gradle -- Could not find tools.jar
Post._content:
![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/gradle.png)

##  
* CentOS 7 x86_64
* `sudo yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk`OpenJDK8
* Spring-Boot`./gradlew bootRun` 
* `Could not find tools.jar
* OSXUbuntuCentOS

## 
* StackOverFlow[Gradle does not find tools.jar](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11345193/gradle-does-not-find-tools-jar)[Correct way of referencing tools.jar in a cross-platform way](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/25626757/correct-way-of-referencing-tools-jar-in-a-cross-platform-way/25628156#25628156)build.gradletools
* devdevelpippython-devOpenJDKdev
* `sudo yum search openjdk | grep -i dev``java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel`![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/yum-search-openjdk-dev.png)
* `sudo yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel``./gradlew bootRun`

## 

![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/donate-me.png)

Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
Hexo()

## 
*	NodeJS
*	GitHub (SSHGitHub)
*	 ()

## 

### Hexo
`$ npm install -g hexo`

### GitHub

*	GitHub Pages (GitHubmaster*username.github.io*)*http://username.github.io*
*	gh-pages (gh-pages)CNAMECSS![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/Getting-Started-With-Hexo/hexo-without-css.png
)

### 
1.	cloneGitHub
2.	mastergh-pagesgh-pages`$ git branch gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages` 
3.	hexo `$ hexo init`npmnode_modules `$ npm install`
4.	hexoHello-World`$ hexo server`[localhost:4000](http://localhost:4000/)(ctrl-c)
5.	`$ hexo new "new blog name"`hexo*new-blog-name.md*
6.	GitHub
	*	*_config.yml*
	
		``` yaml
		# Deployment
		## Docs: http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
		deploy:
			type: git
			repository: git@github.com:username/blog.git
			branch: master
		```
  	*	 *ERROR Deployer not found : 		git*git`$ npm install hexo-		deployer-git --save`
	*	`$ hexo generate`
	* 	GitHub`$ hexo deploy`
7.	 
	*	GitHub Pages*http://username.github.io*
	* gh-pages*chaosjohn.com*
		+	DNSAGitHub PagesIP 
			- 192.30.252.153
			- 192.30.252.154
		+	DNSCNAME*blog**username.github.io*'.'CNAME
		+ source*CNAME**blog.chaosjohn.com* 
		+ GitHub`$ hexo d -g` 
8.  
	*	 
		+	hexo new "postName" #
		+	hexo new page "pageName" #
		+	hexo generate #public
		+	hexo server #4000'ctrl + c'server
		+	hexo deploy #.deployGitHub
		+	hexo help  # 
		+	hexo version  #Hexo
	*	 
		+	hexo deploy -g  #
		+	hexo server -g  #
	*	 
		+	hexo n == hexo new
		+	hexo g == hexo generate
		+	hexo s == hexo server
		+	hexo d == hexo deploy

![](http://7xqld8.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/donate-me.png)
(~~

Hexo

GitHub

  1. cloneGitHub
  2. mastergh-pagesgh-pages$ git branch gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages
  3. hexo $ hexo initnpmnode_modules $ npm install
